title: Your Shop pre-fix discounts
body: So recently in Your Shop I got some nice skins so i decided to buy them, but was only able to do so after it got taken down and put up again. But when doing this I noticed that the discounts had changed. For the skins wich I wanted to buy, they were cheaper before. What can I do to buy them at the pre-fix price?

replies.body: No worries! Hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we can verify which offers you had and first and help you get those deals still ^_^!
